website_summaries.verdict: A premium mesh riding jacket that offers outstanding protection, durability, and quality.
pros: Provides a removable dual-density spine pad with pocket and high-density rib padding for unparalleled comfort
Mesh shell delivers extra support and protection
Removable waterproof liner offers superior versatility
Contoured armor at the shoulders and elbows is both practical and sleek
cons: May be loose around the neck
Tends to be more expensive than many comparable options

customer_reviews.title: Saved husband from injury during crash!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my husband and he loved it. The fit was great and he liked the way it looked. Unfortunately he was in an accident only 2 weeks after we bought it. He was wearing it when he slid across the pavement and although his new jacket was shredded, he walked away with only a few small areas of road rash. It could have been much worse. I truly believe this jacket saved him a trip to the ER!
customer_reviews.author: Laurel

customer_reviews.title: Joe Rocket Mesh Riding Jacket, good buy
customer_reviews.text: I originally would prefer leather but when I got my hands on this jacket I found the mesh material to be pretty sturdy. It comes with armor padding for your back and shoulders too. It may take some getting used to but if I ever took a tumble on my bike I reckon I'd be very happy to have the extra protection. Since I come from a pretty hot climate I also like the ventilation which keeps me cool when the sun is especially harsh on those cloudless days. When I go highway speeds the vents and fittings help so I don't feel like a wind sail too. Overall happy with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Decker

customer_reviews.title: 5'4" 160lb size - Small
customer_reviews.text: The headline is to hopefully help anyone trying to determine their size. I've only rode in it twice but it's pretty damn nice. I was worried it wouldn't fit short people that well but the sleeve length is perfect. The "armor" feels like Styrofoam on steroids. Definitely feels like it would save my life but I hope I never find out. The CON: "Rocket" tramp stamp No stars taken off for the tramp stamp but it does look funny.
customer_reviews.author: R. Litorja

customer_reviews.title: looks nice.fit is decent.
customer_reviews.text: looks nice fit is decent but I do not see much protection when liner is removed.thin mesh on your back?no thanks.ive been riding sport bikes since 1987.i know what a road rash can do.im sending it back and ordering the leather joe rocket jacket.it does look like it would definitely cool better but at what price?when you slide on your back your shoulder blades take the most road rash.yes your spine does too but what sticks out further?it may offer good protection but I would rather have great protection.
customer_reviews.author: T. Hansen

customer_reviews.title: Cool and Lightweight Protection
customer_reviews.text: For summer riding, this is a great jacket. It is SUPER lightweight but has armor in the right places. My only concern is if the mesh would evaporate on road contact but those areas most likely to hit have fabric and armor. It's definitely much better, much safer than riding in a t shirt (we've all been there, right?) and the mesh let's in about the same air as if you were in a t shirt. It's not cheap but for a motorcycle mesh jacket it's nicely constructed and I feel safer riding with it than without. Definitely not for fall or winter, you'll freeze in it.
customer_reviews.author: RP Meggs

customer_reviews.title: Very nice jacket.
customer_reviews.text: I really like this jacket. Its good for summer and winter. The inner liner helps with the cold and the mesh with the summer. I ride a cruiser in florida all year around. This jacket make me feel safe and looking awesome. It comes with belt straps to keep it from sliding off your back. It also feels comfortable. Here in florida in the summer months. March to September, during local riding you might feel a bit hot, but not sweaty. In the highway, it feels always cool.
customer_reviews.author: Tipo Review Master

customer_reviews.title: Ehh...I sent it back
customer_reviews.text: I am told Joe Rocket use to be decent quality. Now, it seems to be hit or miss (at bet). I sent this jacket back. Quality was not there. Fit was OK, but nothing to write home about. Padding was small - like they were paying by the square inch. I don;t mind paying for decent gear (I don't ENJOY it, but I don't mind), but there has to be some quality. Why sweat in protective gear if it is just going to tear away in a crash?
customer_reviews.author: Chris C.

customer_reviews.title: A lot of jacket for the money
customer_reviews.text: Looked at a lot of jackets before opting for this one. Have to say, it’s got a lot of bang for the buck. Waterproof liner performs well with the shell or without. Plenty of snug points to tighten up the fit. A good thing probably, because I think it runs a hair big. If you have a belly, it’s probably pretty forgiving, but I have to cinch it quite a bit. Construction seems good. We’ll see how it fares over time. Not having to buy armor separately is a nice plus. Like I say, just a good all around value at ~$120.
customer_reviews.author: kimber

customer_reviews.title: Really nice product.
customer_reviews.text: I am 5'9" and about 170lbs and the medium fit me well. Love the mesh for cooling and the pads cover the whole elbow/shoulder/back area very well. All of these could be replaceable for CE level 1 or 2 if you are into serious riding or just want to feel extra safe.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: The best for the price.
customer_reviews.text: I've been using joe rocket jackets for a very long time. I have a leather one that I love but is getting old. Plus it was a little heavy for what I need it for. I bought this to try out in really hot weather and let me tell you. I love it. Breathes very nice. Has a ton of air flow so your not sweating the whole time. It is pretty light duty though. I still use my leather when I need to but this one is great for really hot days. Size was pretty accurate as well.
customer_reviews.author: Art

customer_reviews.title: great quality  throughout with a nice sporty cut.
customer_reviews.text: Great quality for the price with a really sporty cut. The rain liner is pretty easy to put on and take off and takes up little room so there's a good chance I'll actually have it with me if I need it. Thankfully I can't vouch for the durability during a crash yet but the pads at shoulders and elbow sit where they're supposed to. I will upgrade the spine pad soon to a CE certified pad. The pockets are roomy enough for some ladies phone numbers too' which is nice.
customer_reviews.author: Robert Davis

customer_reviews.title: I think this jacket is pretty good for the price
customer_reviews.text: I think this jacket is pretty good for the price. The venilation is great since it is nothing but mesh on the front, which makes it the perfect jacket for summer riding. The only thing I'm not fond of are the foam protection pads. While I'm sure they would provide some protection, I much rather prefer kevlar. The only problems I've noticed is that my elbow pads and shoulder pads get twisted up when I'm putting it on. Over-all, I gave it 4 stars. It's not as expensive as kevlar jackets so I have to give them that and you don't get hot while wearing it, but there's just something about it that makes it seem uncomfortable to me.
customer_reviews.author: Craig

customer_reviews.title: Expectations Exceeded
customer_reviews.text: Love this jacket for Florida summer riding. Rain liner folds up small so easy to put in tool bag. Got caught in rain once and it protected me. The mesh allows airflow so I’m not hot at all. Despite of the sizing reviews every body type is different. Riding jackets are supposed to be form fitting and tighter than usual do it doesn’t flap in the wind.
customer_reviews.author: Michael

customer_reviews.title: Very satisfied, would recommend
customer_reviews.text: Fits great!! I got a size big to layer up underneath it.The mesh is perfect for hot weather. The biggest problem you will have is picking the dead bugs out of it!! :)
customer_reviews.author: Brian

customer_reviews.title: Great for warm weather!
customer_reviews.text: I have a very nice fall, winter, and spring AlpineStar jacket and use this as my summer jacket. Overall, love it and am very satisfied with it! Cool enough for a hot South Carolina summer day while offering some decent protection. Would recommend to others.
customer_reviews.author: Ewood86

customer_reviews.title: Looks like it will provide good protection and it looks good
customer_reviews.text: Love this jacket and the looks. Fitment was dead on with the size chart. My only complaint is that it’s a little short but it still looks great and happy with this purchase. Hopefully will have no falls in the future and won’t have to test its protection capabilities but anything can happen when riding, it looks like it will do its job!
customer_reviews.author: Marc J

customer_reviews.title: Lack of quality on seams
customer_reviews.text: I was very happy with this jacket I bought to use with my motorcycle. It has a very nice design and it fits me perfect. After the third usage I found a hole in the right arm. I looked deeply and it seems to be a problem with the seam. I do not think that this quality is the one that Joe Rocket wants for their jackets. I hope someone contact me to see what we can do to solve this quality problem. I was thinking to buy a new Joe Rocket leather jacket because I like their style and brand, but I will wait to see how their react in front of claim.
customer_reviews.author: Gustavo Colly

customer_reviews.title: Good jacket for long or short rides
customer_reviews.text: Nice jacket for the price, I use this on my gsxr and my cruiser. Comes with pads in the shoulders, back and arms. The liner is warm so you won't need it if it's nice outside. Let's a lot of airflow without the liner as well. I ordered a size larger than what I thought I would need and it's a perfect fit.
customer_reviews.author: jason

customer_reviews.title: Very Pleased
customer_reviews.text: I was very nervous about buying this online. I did a bit of research and decided to roll the dice on this. I'm very glad I did. This is a bad ass jacket. I ordered this on a Tuesday regular shipping it arrived on Thursday, 4 days before it was suppose to. I ride a cruiser so I didn't want a jacket with a lot of padding showing. This was perfect. Very breathable without the rain liner and fits great. For a size reference; I'm 6'2" 195lbs and I got an XL. I would highly recommend this jacket.
customer_reviews.author: Rick

customer_reviews.title: The jacket vents well and is comfortable. If you wear a size Large shirt then ...
customer_reviews.text: The liner in this jacket is very thick and tuff. I think it will do well during the colder months. I have the liner out since it's summer time. The jacket vents well and is comfortable. If you wear a size Large shirt then buy a size Large jacket. Great jacket for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Anna M.

customer_reviews.title: good jacket
customer_reviews.text: Great jacket been useing it all summer without liner. Its cold here now about 50 to 60 degrees so I put liner in jacket. I stay warm with the liner installed at these temps. Im 5.11 200 pounds and bought a XL and fits snug but good.
customer_reviews.author: John D. Burkhart

customer_reviews.title: Works for me
customer_reviews.text: If you take out the lining, the jacket is very light and airy, especially during the hot summer months. The armor is adequate and I hope I never have to use it for that. Overall a very solid jacket, especially for beginner riders.
customer_reviews.author: MM88

customer_reviews.title: Great fit and much cooler than a textile jacket.
customer_reviews.text: This is my third Joe Rocket jacket, but first mesh jacket. It fit as expected and is comfortable for all day riding in hot weather. I ended up with a black jacket, wanted a white one so help keep cooler but it wasn't available and I needed something quickly for an MSF course. Not the jackets fault though. It kept me cool enough while on the tarmac all day in 95F+ weather.
customer_reviews.author: BigMikeSndTech

customer_reviews.title: Just perfect!
customer_reviews.text: 'I got this for my husband as an early Father's Day present as he had no summer jacket. A friend of ours went down on his bike recently and so hubby became concerned for his own safety. He had his eye on this for a few weeks, and I got it for him. He LOVES it. Says its the perfect amount of air moving through, and it fits him nicely. He is 5'9" and 210 pounds--ordered the 2x and it still has some room if he added a light jacket underneath in cooler weather. Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Kimberly Amos

customer_reviews.title: Joe Rocket Mesh Jacket
customer_reviews.text: This is a nice Jacket. I like the lower straps you can use to secure the bottom to your belt this helps keep the jacket from floating upwards in the wind. I typically where a large but this jacket seems to come a little big. Even with it strapped down it still pushes up a little. I think a medium would have fit me better with this jacket.
customer_reviews.author: Don

customer_reviews.title: Great comfortable riding jacket
customer_reviews.text: What a great riding jacket. It's comfortable by the jackets cut and materials, job well done. The placements of the protection pads are appropriate. The front does not push up hard on you when you sit down on your bike. There are pockets to hold a lot of items. It has heavy duty zippers throughout. There are zippers at the ends of your sleeves and at the abdomen to let air in for cooling. Also the jacket looks well when worn, looks like I have more muscle. Lol. I recommend this jacket to my family and friends.
customer_reviews.author: GMac

customer_reviews.title: Sizing seems good, maybe a little tight/small
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable/cool for summer riding. Sizing seems good, maybe a little tight/small. I'm 5'11" & 190lbs and my large fits me slightly snug, like it was tailored. Only critique, if you don't pull the zipper up correctly it can easily come apart.
customer_reviews.author: greg

customer_reviews.title: Shoulder pads hurts..
customer_reviews.text: Shoulder pads are little too tight for me but other then that it's very nice and sold. Also very cool without lining. Mostly satisfied but like I said shoulder pads Hurts badly.
customer_reviews.author: j.choi

customer_reviews.title: great jacket, great value
customer_reviews.text: I like the jacket very much. Wear it all the time, even on 90 deg. days. On really hot days the jacket hasn't gotten to hot to wear.
customer_reviews.author: Paul Dos Santos

customer_reviews.title: Great fit!  Cool in the summer, warm in the cooler weather with liner!
customer_reviews.text: Great fit! Cool in the summer, warm in the cooler weather with liner! I was considering other cheaper jackets without a liner, but decided on this and glad I did. I'm 210 lbs 5'11'' 48 chest and 36 waist and this jacket fits me perfectly. Very adjustable for comfort and fit if needed. Mesh stays very cool, and liner acts as a windbreaker as well as for rain.
customer_reviews.author: vncegnger

customer_reviews.title: awesome jacket.
customer_reviews.text: Awesome jacket, I had the red one for years and got a new bike so needed a new jacket, got the black. Love this. Keeps you warm in cold weather and cool in warmer weather. It looks great. Definitely get one size up than your used to wearing but would definitely recommend this to anyone. Especially for the price. Safe riding everyone, keep the rubber side down!
customer_reviews.author: Timothy H.

customer_reviews.title: Jacket is great for summer riding as it is super breathable
customer_reviews.text: Jacket is great for summer riding as it is super breathable. It does have an issue with the zipper popping apart at the base were the main connector is. Additionally the jacket has a somewhat cheap feel to it, other than that I highly recommend it as a protective piece for hot days.
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: Life/skin saver
customer_reviews.text: Great jacket for summer and light showers. Amazing protection... After my rear tire blew, I got tossed for about 50+ feet and if it wasn't for my leather pants and velocity jacket, I would be needing skin; not to mention the time in the hospital. Walked out of the hospital about three hours later. Will buy again.
customer_reviews.author: RP

customer_reviews.title: Hreat value
customer_reviews.text: Fits well, armour stays in place,still a bit warm for the hottest days but overall a great mesh jacket
customer_reviews.author: Cyril M.

customer_reviews.title: Good mesh jacket
customer_reviews.text: There is a cloth grab on the zipper that gets caught in the wind and hits me in the neck and chin. Have to leave the jacket unzipped a few inches to avoid this. The liner snaps out easily and makes a big difference on chilly mornings. Overall quality jacket.
customer_reviews.author: Tom C.

customer_reviews.title: Love the removable waterproof liner
customer_reviews.text: Love the removable waterproof liner! it gets way too hot if you don't need it so take it out when possible. I kinda worry about the mesh holding up in a crash. It looks good and has nice armor on the elbows and back. No chest protection though and the shoulder armor seems to have a bit more movement than I would like. Cant complain too much. i do like it and i haven't crashed yet to test it. I pray I don't, I pray you don't either!
customer_reviews.author: Shelly Fisher

customer_reviews.title: Great Jacket, padding could be higher quality
customer_reviews.text: My hubs really likes this jacket, he may have to replace the pads with something a little more durable, however the jacket is nice. I had to exchange the first one because it was too big for him. He usually wears a medium but needed a small jacket because the arms were too big. He's 5'5" 150lbs.
customer_reviews.author: Kasey

customer_reviews.title: Perfect summer riding jacket
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for hot summer rides! Breathes but protects you from the road and the sun. Order the same size as your T-shirt and you'll be good.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very nice.
customer_reviews.text: I wore this on a sunny day in traffic. Stayed cool and the air flowed thru nicely. Fit is good. I wear a xl in all my clothes so I bought a xxl in this jacket, fits just right. Good quality.
customer_reviews.author: John L.

customer_reviews.title: ... out liner and this one is by far the best yet. The waterproof liner actually acts as an ...
customer_reviews.text: I have a much heavier jacket with a zip out liner and this one is by far the best yet. The waterproof liner actually acts as an insulator making it comfortable for the cooler morning rides. Take out the liner and it is VERY comfortable... even in 80-90 degree days.
customer_reviews.author: Chuck K.

customer_reviews.title: AWESOME
customer_reviews.text: Love it great for summer or winter just layer up throw your rain insert in and ride
customer_reviews.author: Erich Rankin

customer_reviews.title: A great low-cost jacket
customer_reviews.text: I looked at a lot of jackets before buying this one. It is comfortable and the armor is in the right places. I haven't used it in cold weather so I don't know how warm it is with the liner in it, but it is well-ventilated for summer riding.
customer_reviews.author: Alex Meadows

customer_reviews.title: Thank you for an excellent product, makes 95 degree days in South Florida ...
customer_reviews.text: After a year if abuse it has held up very well. I have bought a few more Joe Rocket products for this reason. Thank you for an excellent product , makes 95 degree days in South Florida bearable .
customer_reviews.author: ftlauderdale37

customer_reviews.title: Worth the Money
customer_reviews.text: Great jacket, season adjustable, good safety features built in and comfortable
customer_reviews.author: Douglas Hall

customer_reviews.title: If tall.
customer_reviews.text: Should think about men over six feet tall and their long arms. Otherwise protects weather elements while on the motorcycle and is great.
customer_reviews.author: Shelly

customer_reviews.title: Great fit for 6 foot and athletic/healthier frame
customer_reviews.text: Great fit for 6 foot and athletic/healthier frame. I have a long reach and wide shoulders so it is very hard to buy jackets that dont look short in the arms, this is a tad short but much better than all others I tried at a B&M. No miles yet, but out of the box I am very happy with the purchase.
customer_reviews.author: D. Seibert

customer_reviews.title: Great jacket. True to size and very comfortable
customer_reviews.text: Great jacket. True to size and very comfortable. My son loves it.
customer_reviews.author: Candy Huml

customer_reviews.title: Nice riding jacket for the cost
customer_reviews.text: Great for the hot weather, not really sure if the foam "armor" will really protect in an accident. I bought it to have something long sleeve while riding. The rain liner fits nicely in the saddle bag.
customer_reviews.author: Scott

customer_reviews.title: Good Summer jacket, and you get what you pay for.
customer_reviews.text: Jacket was ok for the money. It runs small. I went to Joe Rocket and used their sizing chart. I am a 48 in chest which should be a XL and jacket was skin tight so Ibsent it back.
customer_reviews.author: Steven

customer_reviews.title: If you like cool cruising
customer_reviews.text: If you like cool cruising, road rash protection and good looks THIS is your jacket. Fit is perfect and the optional waterproof liner is amazing.
customer_reviews.author: B Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Great for Summer
customer_reviews.text: My husband is 5'10 and weighs around 220lbs. The jacket fits great, though it sits a little higher on the waist. (He does have a longer torso.) Great jacket for summer riding in Florida!
customer_reviews.author: KMB

customer_reviews.title: Great for Texas heat.
customer_reviews.text: Great jacket! Definitely wearable in the Texas heat which is very important for me. Runs a little small, but I when a size up which worked out perfect. Strongly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Barry McConway

customer_reviews.title: The large jacket fit perfect. It light and comfortable but still protects from ...
customer_reviews.text: I'm 5'10 and 180. The large jacket fit perfect. It light and comfortable but still protects from mild elements and I feel like it would supply protection. Great jacket
customer_reviews.author: Joshua Bush

customer_reviews.title: Nice jacket for price
customer_reviews.text: This jacket is good for the price. It has the padding I wanted, though, I didn't look into it enough to realize that the padding on the shoulders and elbows wasn't going to be as hard as I wanted. BUT the spine pad is actually really hard, AND just so anyone buying a jacket for the first time can know....the waterproof liner isn't just nice for water-resistance, but also it acts as a wind breaker for those living in colder climates ;). LOVE IT.
customer_reviews.author: Zachary A. Cupp

customer_reviews.title: Awesome jacket, one of the best I have worn
customer_reviews.text: Awesome jacket, one of the best I have worn! I wear an XL shirt size and ordered XXL, fits perfect!
customer_reviews.author: Roderick Ehlinger

customer_reviews.title: used it upto about 88 degrees and the airflow is very nice.
customer_reviews.text: Use it daily. Very well ventilated. used it upto about 88 degrees and the airflow is very nice.
customer_reviews.author: AA

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Fell while wearing this jacket, no injuries or scratches to my upper body or arms
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: My new favorite jacket. Great for warm weather if you take ...
customer_reviews.text: My new favorite jacket. Great for warm weather if you take the inner liner out. Fits perfect and provides support.
customer_reviews.author: Tony

customer_reviews.title: Nice Jacket
customer_reviews.text: I love the jacket.... It has padding inside and removable insulation, very comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: but this is one super jacket. The mesh makes sure the entire ride ...
customer_reviews.text: Haven't tried with the inner waterproof layers yet, but this is one super jacket. The mesh makes sure the entire ride is comfortable, the pads are in the right place for me and it is super comfortable for long rides. Love it.
customer_reviews.author: Malhar Anaokar

customer_reviews.title: Should of bought a long time ago!
customer_reviews.text: I've been riding since 1966. How come I haven't had a jacket like this till now? I'm going to look into pants now.
customer_reviews.author: bruce huberty

customer_reviews.title: Cool without liner...
customer_reviews.text: Great jacket for it's price, very cool when you wear it without the liner.
customer_reviews.author: Carlos Rodriguez

customer_reviews.title: Excellent value for money
customer_reviews.text: Excellent value for money. cool and comfortable. this is my second jacket. same model, the first was damaged in an accident and fortunately did its job protection.
customer_reviews.author: Henry  Rojas

customer_reviews.title: Very cool. The elbow protectors tend to slide down a ...
customer_reviews.text: A little on the short side. Tight fit. I guess is the design. Very cool. The elbow protectors tend to slide down a bit, but nothing critical.
customer_reviews.author: Jorge Barrero

customer_reviews.title: Buttons stink!
customer_reviews.text: I like this jacket, It's very breathable. It seems to offer some decent protection. I give it 4 stars since overall it's not bad. The jacket doesn't look all that great, looks better in picture than real life. Also the buttons that go around your arms come undone often, I'm sure it wouldn't hold up well in a crash, Although the material seems to be of good quality and I believe would protect the user from road rash. Fix your buttons Joe Rocket! Also, I don't recommend anyone buying a black jacket, I bought black and have regretted ever since, sure it's breathable when you're moving, but the second you are standing still, it gets very hot very quick.
customer_reviews.author: Chris C.

customer_reviews.title: Size problem
customer_reviews.text: Size not compatible with my build. Too tapered. I'm 5'7", 165 lbs.
customer_reviews.author: Michele L

customer_reviews.title: Good choice
customer_reviews.text: Great jacket,I am 5'10" 170lbs and the Large fits perfect.Shipping was very fast,definitely good jacket for those hot summer days.
customer_reviews.author: Lorak

customer_reviews.title: Very Pleased With Joe Rocket Velocity Mesh Jacket
customer_reviews.text: This jacket fits well, is lightweight and easily adjustable with velcro closures at sleeve and waist. It was comfortable, even in very hot August weather--100+ degrees, on two recent 250 mile cross-country rides from southwest Louisiana to east-central Texas. Excellent breathability and flow-through ventilation. This is my second Joe Rocket mesh jacket, and I will buy another whenever the time comes for replacement.
customer_reviews.author: Ken Bethea

customer_reviews.title: Good jacket
customer_reviews.text: Got this jacket the other day for summer-weather riding. Is well made, fits well, and comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: E K.

customer_reviews.title: My husband is extremely happy with the fit and style of this jacket
customer_reviews.text: My husband is extremely happy with the fit and style of this jacket. The mesh allows for great ventilation without the liner.
customer_reviews.author: Jenn

customer_reviews.title: The armor is not bad. The elbow armor would be great
customer_reviews.text: I have worn this jacket about 100 times. I wear it all day while touring. I've also slept in it. It's been throw rain, hail, snow, and 120+ degree death valley heat. For the price the build quality is about what you'd expect. I haven't had any seems tear. The zipper is a bit finnicky and I expect it to break any day now. The armor is not bad. The elbow armor would be great, but the elastic straps that help to keep it in place come unbuckled at the slightest touch I would save up a bit more money for a better product next time.
customer_reviews.author: Sean currens

customer_reviews.title: Better than expected
customer_reviews.text: "Jacket looks much better than the picture suggests.Jacket is light, its comfortable, and an amazing value for the price. Fits true to size.
customer_reviews.author: JB1

customer_reviews.title: Great product, size seems to run on the bigger side.
customer_reviews.text: Great product for the money. I am 5'11'' and about 195lbs. I ordered a large and it was too big for me. I ordered a medium so we'll see how that works out. I'll send back whichever doesn't fit.
customer_reviews.author: Marcus Voshell

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: Very light weight jacket that does everything you want it to. Keeps you comfortable throughout a wide range of temperatures ranging from cold to hot.
customer_reviews.author: joker

customer_reviews.title: Like a glove...
customer_reviews.text: Really nice but these jackets run small. I'm 6,1 230 lbs had to get the 2XL. Fits great but if you are a gym rat I suggest 2 sizes up.
customer_reviews.author: Craig Blain

customer_reviews.title: Looks and feels nice
customer_reviews.text: The zipper came broken. I gave it as a gift, and I would have to pay for shipping to get it fixed. That would be the only negative comment. Otherwise, great jacket
customer_reviews.author: Kinger2

customer_reviews.title: Nice jacket
customer_reviews.text: Nice riding jacket , kinda thin nice to wear on summer nights or rides where you want the extra protection
customer_reviews.author: Mike

customer_reviews.title: Really like the look
customer_reviews.text: Really like the look, feel and over all quality. Great for warm and wet conditions. Could layer up underneath in colder temps.
customer_reviews.author: madisonHQ

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: Love the jacket, the fitting is just right, while its been wonderful riding in Nigerias hot weather. Just feels a little too light.
customer_reviews.author: Gboyega Bolaji Adebisi

customer_reviews.title: Otherwise it's a nice hot day jacket that provides some decent protection
customer_reviews.text: Zipper has problems from the second time I put it on. It comes undone at the bottom. It has happened twice but both time I was able to get it unzipped. It zips back up but you need to to real careful when you start to zip. Make sure it's totally engaged. I've examined it and find nothing that seems wrong with the zipper but it has happened a couple times. Otherwise it's a nice hot day jacket that provides some decent protection.
customer_reviews.author: JakeHall

customer_reviews.title: Jacket is too short in my opinion and the padding ...
customer_reviews.text: Jacket is too short in my opinion and the padding moves around in the pockets...it's not stitched in place. Otherwise is well constructed.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel J. Petrocella

customer_reviews.title: Awesome summer jacket
customer_reviews.text: Awesome summer jacket! Can't like it enough. Ventilation is significantly reduced when you wear a backpack, but without one you will be cool as a cucumber.
customer_reviews.author: William L

customer_reviews.title: it fits ok and I like it.
customer_reviews.text: For the price I can say it's okay, it fits ok and I like it.
customer_reviews.author: DANNY V.

customer_reviews.title: fits well
customer_reviews.text: it fits well, quality is more than good, wind proof, nice suport to the body, i recommend this product to everyone
customer_reviews.author: TOP GUN

customer_reviews.title: Just a great jacket
customer_reviews.text: Just a great jacket for a very reasonable price. Good fit no flapping parts, even at higher speeds. In the rain the are no leaks and it dries up quickly, light weight, and comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Jan Degeest

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Awesome simple jacket put on some good iron-on patches and it look like an expensive custom jacket!!!
customer_reviews.author: James underwood

customer_reviews.title: Excellent
customer_reviews.text: This is a quality product and worth the money. Very well made with excellent attention to detail. I would not hesitate to recommend this jacket to anyone.
customer_reviews.author: jerrylee

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Great jacket, liner is removable. With the liner inside it cuts the wind very well. I'm 5'11, 180 lbs and a large fits just right.
customer_reviews.author: Robert Sloat

customer_reviews.title: Great warm weather jacket
customer_reviews.text: I like it. Fits well, great air flow for warm weather and seems safe. I would recommend this.
customer_reviews.author: ebeck

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great coat, drove an hour in the rain and my shirt stayed dry.
customer_reviews.author: RJM

customer_reviews.title: Best motorcycle jacket I've ever owned...
customer_reviews.text: I have had several bike jackets in the past and I gotta say this one is the best. I was not wanting to spend 300-400 dollars on a fancy overpriced jacket by a different brand. It's very comfortable, not to mention looks cool when wearing it. I definitely appear a lot more buff with it on haha I am 5'8 170 pounds and the medium fit me perfectly. Includes a waterproof liner which will keep you warm in cooler weather. This jacket could easily sell for at least twice as much. Always happy with Joe Rocket. Shipping was extremely fast as well!
customer_reviews.author: jon

customer_reviews.title: Probably world's best jacket
customer_reviews.text: I was thoroughly impressed with the supplier and the jacket - beyond any expectation. Stellar jacket, almost too nice for motorcycle wear. Jacket came fast and furious. Highly recommend both the supplier and product to anyone.
customer_reviews.author: Jeff

customer_reviews.title: Looks good
customer_reviews.text: Nice jacket, fits well just a little thinner than I expected. I think it will make a better summer jacket.
customer_reviews.author: Samuel Scarborough

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable, breathes well
customer_reviews.text: Comfortable, breathes well. I usually wear an XL, and ordered an XL. It was a little snug but that's the way it should fit. Works great riding even at city speeds in 100 degree heat. The pads stay where they should and do not interfere with movement. The nylon liner is a nice addition however it will not breathe so keep that in mind. Only complaint is the zippers are plastic and not YKK, but the quality of the jacket overall is good.
customer_reviews.author: some guy out west

customer_reviews.title: Mesh very breathable, and liner great at night......warm!
customer_reviews.text: While fit is not perfect, loose around the neck. This mesh jacket "breaths" nicely. It was a hot summer, and mesh during the day was nice and adding the wind proof, and rain liner at night was great. I wore it almost everyday. The liner is difficult to place back in the jacket, but it works perfectly as a separate jacket. Zipper works great as a two piece layer. Easy done...Made my hot summer! Best choice!
customer_reviews.author: Erwin B.

customer_reviews.title: You cannot get anything better for $117
customer_reviews.text: You cannot get anything better for $117. Good ahead with your purchase if you do not want to spend more than $120 on riding jacket which will be used once or twice a month on rides.
customer_reviews.author: GK

customer_reviews.title: Great Jacket
customer_reviews.text: Perfect fit! I am 5'6, 150lbs with a 37.5 inch chest. Was worried that it may be too big. Fits like it was made for me!!
customer_reviews.author: Cheryl Gerber

customer_reviews.title: Couldn't expect more
customer_reviews.text: Three words, Oh My God. Best Motorcycle Jacket ever, awesome design, feels cool in hot weather like 36C ~37C (you need to remove the water proof piece or it won't feel cool at those temperature LoL). It comes with lots of protection and lots of adjustable mechanism to make it fit your size and it feel comfortable. I don't regret purchasing this jacket at all.
customer_reviews.author: Lazariu

customer_reviews.title: great jacket for the money, vents well on a hot summer day.
customer_reviews.text: fits exactly as expected. check youtube videos reviewing this jacket for more specific info on sizing.
customer_reviews.author: Bruce MacKown

customer_reviews.title: great jacket
customer_reviews.text: I bought this jacket for my son after he had a minor spill on his bike. I decided to keep him safe and cool. This jacket delivers on both: and fit like a glove
customer_reviews.author: Doreen

product_meta.title: Joe Rocket - 1254-0004 Velocity Men's Mesh Riding Jacket (Black, Large)
product_meta.description: Color:Black| Size:LargeTrue to the Velocity series, ultra-affordable doesn't mean you have to sacrifice protection, versatility, style, or summer comfort. FreeAir mesh shell, quick release, removable waterproof liner, contoured armor at the shoulders and elbows, removable dual density spine pad with pocket for optional C.E. spine armor, high density rib padding.
